channel.title: R on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in R on Academic

item.title: Overview
item.description: This feature can be used for publishing content such as: Project or software documentation Online courses Tutorials The parent folder may be renamed, for example, to docs for project documentation or course for creating an online course. To disable this feature, either delete the parent folder, or set draft = true in the front matter of all its pages. After renaming or deleting the parent folder, you may wish to update any [[menu.

item.title: Week One
Week Two
Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
